name: Maple Colors
description: Saku Yoshijirou has just transferred to Kouka Academy, which is famous for its theatrical activities. On his first day at school, he started a fight with Aoi Mirai. To make the matter worse, the fight was seen by Aizen Yukihito, the head of the Drama Club. All of Yoshijirou's classmates are problem students, and he thought he could use the fight to rid himself of them. Then, Yoshijirou is assigned to direct his class in a drama competition against the Drama Club. If they lose the competition, they will be suspended. However, because they are problem students, he has difficulties directing them.

name: Go-Go! Grapplestaff
description:
Go! Go! Grapple Staff is a fast paced, momentum based, 2.5d platformer set in a magical cartoony realm.

The Meddling "Grapple Wizard", once a meagre wizard, now blessed with the knowledge of the deathly-efficient and recently outlawed Grapple Staff, geared up with their pointy hat is able to tear through anyone (or anything) that stands in their way. Mischief, chaos and high speeds are the aims of the game in the Grapple Wizards mission to ascend the peak of the Wizard Council - who banished the Grapple Wizard for their use of the Grapple Staff.

name: Gauntlet Legends
description:
The first console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in September of 1999.

This game introduced an inventory system that allowed players to stock and activate items after they were obtained, with a few exceptions (Invulnerability and Anti-Death Halo). This is also the first Gauntlet game to feature Sumner's tower and his shop. Four-player co-op is supported, but only by making use of the Expansion Pak.

name: Gauntlet Legends
description:
The second console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in March of 2000.

This version is often criticized for its extreme diversity from the original arcade version. Most of the levels have been down-sized, many objects features buggy physics, and lack of four-player cooperative play (omitting Multitap functionality) gave the port relatively bad ratings. The game retains the inventory system from the Nintendo 64 version, the two new realms, and extensive cheat codes.

name: Gauntlet Legends
description:
The third and final console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in June of 2000.

This version is most notable for being a near-direct arcade port, as the only console port to feature the four original Realms from the arcade original. However, some of their levels were completely redone, a new physics engine was used, and some of the soundtracks were remixed.

Like the arcade version, there is no inventory. The player can only access the shop after completing a level. Special items are used on a time limit, which is slightly longer than the arcade version. The game is often criticized for not allowing players to buy food at the shop.

This port includes many features from Gauntlet: Dark Legacy, including its 8 new character classes. The Poisoned Fields area is included as the first level in the Castle Stronghold. The Mausoleum is also accessible from a secret passage in the Castle Courtyard.

name: Put the Sausage in the Bun
description:
Guide a wobbly sausage into its bun using balloons and bees in this chaotic physics puzzle. Can you master the fine art of getting the sausage in just the right place?

Put the Sausage in the Bun is a physics-based puzzle game where your goal is straightforward— get the sausage into the bun. Use balloons and bees to move the sausage through various obstacles, with realistic sausage'y physics making everything a greater challenge than it needs to be. As you progress, new levels introduce new challenges, requiring more precision, fast and creative thinking to complete.

name: The Thaumaturge: Deluxe Edition
description:
Step onto the culturally flourishing streets of Warsaw with an even more fashionable style in The Thaumaturge Digital Deluxe Edition.

To refine your look just as a gentleman should, you receive in-game content: an elegantly stylized hairstyle and facial hair, luxury clothes, and a HUD reskin.

But that's not all; the Deluxe Edition also includes downloadable content:
• Notes from the Grimoire to help you delve into the arcana of thaumaturgy
• A map of Warsaw in 1905 to familiarize yourself with the city
• The Thaumaturge digital soundtrack for your auditory pleasure
• A 3D printable model of the Golem salutor to guard your desk
• A set of wallpapers for an overall aesthetic boost

name: Half-Life 2: 20th Anniversary Update
description: To celebrate the 20th anniversary, Valve has released a massive update to the game itself. Added new features, fixed old bugs, improved some visuals, added more options, and integrated the Steam Workshop into the classic game.

name: Mega Man 42
description: A Mega Man fan game by Servadac. The game is made in the style of the original Mega Man for NES. Because of this many of the newer features are not to be found in the game, such as Mega Man's slide and charge-up buster. There are no E-tanks either. This to preserve the challenge of the game instead of watering it out with features that do not add to the gameplay, and instead detract from it by making it too easy.

Which paths will your choices lead her down? As her guardian angel, guide her to become the superstar everyone dreams of becoming.

name: Election Tycoon: Trump vs. Harris
description: Step into the intense world of U.S. politics with Election Tycoon! In this real-time strategy game, you'll take on the role of a presidential candidate in the 2024 elections. Whether you choose to be Donald Trump, Kamala Harris, or create your own independent candidate, your goal is to sway the nation and secure your place in the White House.

name: Insector X
description:
Insector X is a horizontally scrolling shooter.

The Genesis version has a number of differences: "realistic" sprite work (compared to the "cute" style of the original), brand new music, a reworking of the secondary weapon system, the removal of the autofire powerup, and new stage sections, among other things. Hot-B's original design for the game was better realized on the Genesis, as Taito requested a more comical style of game for the original release.

name: Clutchtime: Basketball Deckbuilder
description:
A basketball-themed Roguelike Deckbuilder. Each player in a basketball team is represented by 3 skill cards like 2 and 3 point shots, rebounds, steals, blocks, assists, crossover moves. There are also coaching cards like timeouts, challenge or substitution.

The cards are played during a match with a goal of outscoring your opponent. You can play an elimination tournament, or a season where you need to qualify into playoffs.

You can trade cards with other teams, duplicate, remove and upgrade them. You can draft new cards at the end of each quarter and keep one of those permanently at the end of each match.

There's a multiplayer mode as well, where you can play PvP matches when you meat during the competition.

"Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles" is a turn-based RPG inspired by the great classics set in the present day.
It tells of the misadventures of a group of bizarre friends who, thanks to the powers gained from an ancient pendant, must prevent a mysterious individual from getting his hands on a dark talisman that could compromise the future of the world. There's just one problem... Let's just say that our friends are not the classic heroes expected to save the planet.
Form your ideal team and explore a total of seven levels filled with puzzles, riddles, obstacles, hidden rewards, and face hordes of strange enemies and monsters in turn-based combat with simple but strategic and often challenging mechanics.

In "VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival," you find yourself as a nomadic explorer cast into the mysterious Void, a world with its own secrets and surprises. This enigmatic realm invites you to uncover its hidden mysteries and navigate its unique landscapes, each filled with challenges and unexpected encounters.
Construct and enhance your sailing vessel to better equip yourself for the journey ahead. Starting with a simple raft, you'll develop it into a formidable vessel complete with a ship's hold, mast, and captain's cabin. Customize your vessel with various objects, from storages and workbenches to decorations, making it truly your own.
As you traverse the surreal terrains of the Void, you'll confront numerous foes and navigate through ever-changing environments. Whether you journey solo or uncover unexpected twists along the way, the Void promises an unparalleled adventure waiting to be experienced, testing your survival skills and resilience.

description: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin is a dark fantasy roguelite with hex-based, turn-based tactical combat. Command your forces, make impactful choices, and navigate a realm consumed by sin—will you restore order or surrender to darkness?

name: Liegecraft
description: You are the King. Lead your vassals, build your feudal realm and conquer foreign kingdoms in this blend of turn based 4X and realtime rpg. Attend feasts, host tourneys and fight duels. Every character has their own mind so promote the loyal, scheme against rivals and imprison the disobedient.

name: Just Skateboard
description: JUST SKATEBOARD is simply a skateboard simulator. Just skate and enjoy the ride.

name: Homegrown
description: Sin descripción

name: A Night Duty
description: It is an upcoming horror game developed in South Korea. The player can simulate a night duty as an officer in Korean army base. It is a game that inspired by the game The Exit 8.

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 1
description:
Episode consisting of seven classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):

dmc1m1 : basewalk (basewalk) by Preacher
dmc1m2 : Acrophobia (dm7) by (maybe) American McGee
dmc1m3 : Bloodrun (ztndm3) by ZTN
dmc1m4 : DeutschMaschine (cmt3) by Gandhi
dmc1m5 : Domination (p3a) by Pingu
dmc1m6 : #endif (endif) by Yataze
dmc1m7 : Lost Entrance to the Dismal Oubliette (e2m10) by John Romero

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 2
description:
Episode consisting of five classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):

dmc2m1 : Deadalus Revisited (imp1dm6) by Biff Debris
dmc2m2 : Slipstream (slip) by Inertia
dmc2m3 : Black Rain (evdm1) by Evan Wagner
dmc2m4 : The Killing Jar (kdmj) by Kell
dmc2m5 : Void Runner (kdmv) by Kell

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 3
description:
Eight small deathmatch levels by various authors converted into an action-packed single player episode. Comes with a start map and a secret level.

dmc3 : Deathmatch Classics Vol.3 by negke
dmc3m1 : Orange Whip (lundm1) by Lunaran
dmc3m2 : Zeal & Fury (spirit1dm3) by spirit
dmc3m3 : Deep Scars (q1shw2) by ShadoW
dmc3m4 : Aghast (aghast) by Vondur
dmc3m5 : Devastation (q1shw1) by ShadoW
dmc3m6 : Dark Ritual (ritual) by Tyrann
dmc3m7 : /me Votes Vondur For World Domination (rpgdm1) by R.P.G.
dmc3m8 : Base Of Two Deaths (negdm1) by negke

name: Deathmatch Remix
description: Eight deathmatch levels remixed for single player, most of them based on the stock DM maps. They run on the SMP mod (included) and come with two skyboxes plus a music track.

name: Fallen Angel
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hidden Ones
description: The new 3D ARPG GAME based on the famous chinese anime IP: Hitori No Shita: The Outcast. The game will be alpha test soon and it plans to launch on PC, console and mobile platform.

name: Mad Mechs
description: Vehicular combat shooter with map-altering environments and exhilarating high-speed battles. Customize your mech and fight through dynamic levels that change over time. Upgrade your arsenal, face off against powerful bosses, and dominate the ever-evolving battlegrounds.

name: Sagas of Lumin
description: Sagas of Lumin is a single player action RPG, where players can tame and ride powerful dragons. Engage in epic aerial battles against flying galleons or other dragon riders. Partake in ground combat; combine different melee weapons, firearms, and spells to come up with your unique combat style.

name: The Home Into The Woods
description: Trapped in the woods you have no idea who or what is there?

name: Journey to the Void
description: Prepare to fend off attacks from all directions in this hybrid strategy roguelite deck builder. On your journey through varied grid-based biomes, battle unique foes and make tough moral choices to restore a corrupted land and decide the fate of your world.

name: Wyrd Waters
description: Wyrd Waters is a fast-paced, tactical multiplayer naval game set in a world inspired by Anglo-Saxon mythology. Join forces or face off with up to 8 friends as you command your fleet, outwit rivals, and navigate perilous, kraken-infested seas!

name: Federico
description: Sin descripción

name: Vigilant
description:
A Dark story for Vigilants of Stendarr. This mod includes a lot of unique armor sets, weapons, jewelry, creatures and more.

Episode 1: The Summoner (Tutorial)
The Player becomes a Vigilant of Stendarr, and chases down a Summoner of Molag Bal.
To start the quest, speak with Altano, who is located in the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.

Episode 2: Bloody Matron (Small Dungeon)
The Player investigates the disappearance of multiple prisoners from the Windhelm dungeons.
It automatically start after Act1. When you update from older version, You need to activate "Water Snakes"of debug room.

Episode 3: Child of Oblivion (Horror, Hide and Seek)
The Player must rescue the owners of a noble mansion.
It automatically start after Act2. When you update from older version, You need to activate "Water Spirits" of debug room.

Episode 4: Oblivion (New World, Non-Journal)
The Player is trapped in Oblivion, and must wander the wasteland in order to find a way out.
The quest begins immediately after Episode 3.

name: L'entraînement des Guerriers
description:
In this immersive strategy game, you take command of an army in the prehistoric era, facing endless waves of increasingly powerful and determined enemies. Starting with modest resources, your mission is to lead your forces through the ages of prehistory, upgrading your base, developing your troops, and mastering skills and technologies tailored to this primitive world. With each level, the challenges grow tougher, as enemies become more resilient and strategic, making every battle more intense and harder to survive. You’ll need to adapt your strategy, strengthen your defenses, and recruit increasingly powerful units to stay ahead.

Continuous improvement of your camp lies at the heart of the experience. After each battle, you earn science points, a valuable resource that allows you to unlock powerful upgrades. Using these points, you can reinforce your base fortifications, increase your warriors' strength, and unlock new abilities that will turn the tide in upcoming battles. Whether you choose to build an impenetrable defense, train a formidable army, or explore advanced prehistoric technologies, every decision will impact your future combats.

For a more personal touch, you can also customize your units and army with unique skins. These customization options add originality to your playstyle and allow you to forge an army that reflects your vision.

The ultimate challenge is to progress through the levels and overcome the ever-more fearsome waves of prehistoric enemies. As you advance, you’ll unlock new units, from basic warriors to mighty champions, each with unique skills to turn the tide of battle. The enemy waves will grow stronger without relent, but with each level, you’ll gain the tools and knowledge needed to overcome them and lead your army to victory.

And the best part? The game is completely free. Everything is accessible without ever needing to pull out your credit card, thanks to a fair ad-supported system that fuels your progression.

name: Federico Returns
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wheels of Lull
description: Return to Sotha Sil and enter the stranger side of TES lore, as you join the ranks of the mysterious Chronographers in this fully voiced DLC sized quest mod that adds over 10 new quests, multiple new armors and weapons, sprawling dungeons, unique boss fights, and much much more!

name: Federico y la Herencia
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel HQ
description:
Marvel HQ is the ultimate destination for kids ages 3-8 to explore the Marvel Universe, offering access to a wide range of comics, videos, activities, and more.

Marvel HQ is a treasure trove of heroic content. This massive app offers a vast array of activities, videos, comics, and creative tools. Whether coding with Hulk, watching thrilling episodes of Spidey and His Amazing Friends, reading Marvel stories, or revealing and encouraging artistic talents. Kids can even take care of, play with, and nurture their very own Groot. There's always something new to discover.

name: Marvel Collect! by Topps
description: Collect & trade your favorite MARVEL characters with comic book fans around the world in MARVEL Collect! by Topps. Complete daily collector-based missions, trade 24/7, spin the Card Wheel, FUSE lower-tier cards for higher valued inserts, and customize your profile to showcase your collection!

name: Marvel 5DX Legacy
description: Iconic Marvel Cinematic Universe characters come to life in stunning Augmented Reality! Collect Marvel Cinematic Universe heroes and villains like Iron Man, Witness Captain America, Captain Marvel, Spider-man, Thanos and more. Improve your heroes’ stats and unlock special characters & moves as you expand your card collection. Now it’s time to enter the real-time online battles and experience never-before-seen action!

name: Marvel Hero Tales
description:
Are you a fan of the Marvel universe? Do you like to play games? Do you like to read comics? Do you want to be a hero?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you will love this game!

In this game, you will get to play as different heroes in the Marvel universe, such as Spider-Man, Captain America, Black Panther, etc. These heroes have unique powers, such as the ability to jump, fly, etc. In this game, you will get to explore New York City and fight various criminals.

In this game, you will need to use your powers to fight the criminals and help the citizens of New York City.

The game is full of action and adventure!

name: Pic-Me!
description: Test how well you know your fellow players and how creative you can be! In this turn-based card game, the goal is to find the perfect word to describe one of the images on your cards—not too easy, but not too difficult either. If your description isn't good enough, your opponents will have a chance to steal points with a better-fitting card. But if your description is too obvious, everyone scores points—except you! Only those who strike the perfect balance have a chance to win!

name: Crystalfall
description:
Hack 'N' Slash Action RPG in a Steampunk World

Take on the role of a convict who has been thrown into the dungeons by a powerful ruling organization. Embark on a journey through a world devastated by a mysterious asteroid, scattering powerful crystal shards across distinct world zones brimming with mutated creatures and steampunk enemies.

Delve into post-apocalyptic dungeons that randomize upon each visit and ascend to new heights of power with epic loot, extensive talent tree progression, theorycrafting and lootable skills.

name: Dixit World
description:
Dixit World is the adaptation of the famous board game Dixit.

While keeping in mind the originality of the game, the game on mobile application is a unique experience by taking advantage of the support of the video game.
Enjoy the classic gameplay of Dixit or create and share your Worlds with your friends.

name: Explorers
description:
Explore an archipelago, encounter fellow explorers, and seduce and haggle with them to help you complete your map!
There is no time constraint, no danger, there's no gameover. Instead, this game proposes a calming experience of exploration and encounters. You can just stop playing when you feel satisfied. A play session will usually last 15 to 30 minutes.

name: Mubosama
description: We were spending our usual summer—catching beetles, chasing dogs, finding good spots. And then, we learned about her existence. MUBOSAMA is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: Undying: The Beast
description: Your town calls you a witch, but you're a simple, widowed herbalist. Tonight is your first brush with the supernatural. A man is hunted and finds refuge in your home, and you can tell he's something other than human.

name: Undying: Reject
description: A short visual novel in which a vampire offers his help

name: Hellgate Senigallia Remake
description: An RPG-infused boomer-shooter with dark and mysterious tones, offering innovative gameplay with a nostalgic nod to the '90s. Get ready to blow everything up and turn enemies into cannon fodder before facing the massive end-level bosses!

name: Women's Dresses
description: A short kinetic novel about an intimidating knight and his love for women's dresses

name: Blank
description:
BLANK is a horror/romance visual novel with an unconventional structure, made for the Spooktober VN jam.
Make your wish, and change the world to fit your desires. But should the world unravel, and should it return to its blank state, all will be lost, and you will begin anew.

Will you repeat this loop forever? Will you ever understand what this place is, and why you're here?

... do you want to?

name: The Yandere CEO
description:
William, the CEO of the company you just joined, had always been a man of ambition and success. From a young age, he was driven to achieve greatness, and he had a singular focus on his goals. He rose to the top of his field, building a successful company from the ground up.

However, his relentless drive also came at a cost. He pushed away friends and family, sacrificing personal relationships for the sake of his ambition. He had no time for romance, believing it to be a distraction.

Until he met you...

but you will find out for yourself what happens next..

name: Flat Fat Fartfest
description: Our friend Chuggy just devoured a hearty plate of extra spicy noodles and is on the brink of an epic bout of diarrhea. The nearest toilet is several kilometers up… several. I wish you good luck on your journey, but be warned—the diapers were left at home.

name: Clicker Clicker Clicker
description: Click on the cursor to receive clicker gold. Upgrade your clicks with your clicker gold. Click on the falling cursors to receive more clicker gold! Purchase projectiles in the shop that will clean out the falling cursors for you.

name: Acidophilus
description: Medium-sized copper/metal level; a singleplayer remix of stock DM2 - Claustrophobopolis, based on the original map source.

name: The Containment Centre
description: Small base level; a remake of the first map of the game Viscerafest.

name: Symphony of Steel
description: Small industrial base map; the layout is a tribute to ztn's Bloodrun. It comes with a custom skybox.

name: Flocking Hell
description: Flocking Hell is a turn-based strategy roguelite where you defend your pasture from demon legions. It blends calm exploration with auto-battler combat, offering a mix of easy-to-learn mechanics and deep strategy. It also has a lot of sheep.

name: Demon Slayer
description: Dragon Slayer is a classic browser MMORPG that immerses players in a sprawling, medieval fantasy world filled with epic quests, deep lore, townbuilding and intense PvP action. Set in a war-torn land where the forces of light and darkness battle for dominance, players assume the role of a hero destined to shape the outcome of the ongoing conflict.

name: Hyperchannel
description: This is a free shooting game. The game has very simple operations and beautiful graphics. Great for killing time.

name: Headspace: Unwind Your Mind
description: Do you want to relax, meditate or sleep deeply? Personalize the experience according to your mood or mindset with this Headspace interactive special.

name: Blob
description: Embark on a chemistry-packed adventure! Collect elemental blobs, combine them into powerful compounds, and build the ultimate periodic table collection. One element drop per hour, with more drops influenced by your blobventory!

name: Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe
description: Top, bake, and serve delicious pizzas in Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe! Craft pizzas for Papa Louie's loyal customers while earning tips, points, and Special Recipes. Unlock holiday ingredients for seasonal pies, and take a trip in the Food Truck to serve your own unique creations!

name: Frontline Inferno
description: Step into the boots of a soldier from the Axis, Soviet, or Allied forces and engage in thrilling, rapid-fire battles across colorful, stylized battlegrounds. Frontline Inferno is an action-packed FPS arena shooter that combines the historical setting of World War II with an arcade twist, delivering frantic gunfights, instant respawns, and total freedom in how you gear up.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Mobile
description: An official mobile version of the widely acclaimed MMORPG, developed by Lightspeed Studios!

name: Sports Supermarket
description: From Small Shop to Sports Empire – Are You Ready to Rise?

name: Trading Card Shop Simulator
description: Turn your card collecting dream into a real business!

name: Supermarket Business Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: TCG Card Shop Master
description: What’s your strategy for becoming a top card retailer?

name: CardMart: TCG Supermarket
description: Sin descripción

name: TCG Empire: Card Shop Simulator
description: Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in a world of trading cards!

name: BodyCam Assault Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Pine: Incident Response
description: Black Pine is a 4-player online co-op horror survival game where you and your crew are hired contractors, sent into the Appalachian Mountains to restore critical infrastructure after unknown events devastated the area. Take on important repairs and stay alert—nothing is quite as it seems.

name: YoHoHo.io
description: Open chests and collect doubloons to get bigger. Kill your opponents to collect their booty. Avoid the toxic fog and be the last one to survive on the not-so-desert island.

name: Astro Race
description:
Space Racing .io game

Race in space! Propel against the track to gain speed and accumulate boost fuel. Use your boost at the appropriate time and become the ultimate champion.

name: Ultra Cop
description: A challenging retro arcade FPS/TPS straight from the late '90s. The Crime Wars have started and it's up to the Ultra Cops to bring back ultimate justice. Use Mechs, Riot Cars and serious firepower to bring the pain to the criminal underworld in this 6th Generation Y2K inspired game.

name: Former Dawn
description:
After a failed terraforming mission on an exoplanet light years from Earth, humanity dies out but leaves behind a child species(called the “Formers”) that forgets its own origin. You play a common hunter who rediscovers the truth and struggles against the faceless Organization which will stop at nothing to defeat you. Along the way, you recruit a motley crew of brave Formers who are willing to risk everything for Justice.

Former Dawn is, in a nutshell, a story of discovery, resistance to evil, and exploration of the human condition. The world is rich, the plot complex, and the characters dynamic and multi-dimensional.

name: Former Dawn
description: An upcoming port of Former Dawn for the PC

name: Avowed: Premium Edition
description:
Premium Edition includes:
- Avowed base game
- Up to 5 days early access
- Two Premium Skin Packs
- Access to Avowed Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack

name: Mappy
description: Homebrew Atari 2600 port

name: Copter.io
description: Destroy buildings with your attack helicopter. Evolve and use special abilities to overcome your enemies and become king of the arena.

name: Sklime: A Difficult Climbing Adventure
description: Sklime is a difficult single level twin-stick climbing game taking inspiration from Bennett Foddy's Getting Over It. The player must climb over a thousand meters out of The Depths, visiting 7 different colorful zones while playing some minigames along the way.

name: Air Hunter
description: Chase and Shoot!

name: Zero to Dance Hero
description: Become a Dance Hero from Zero! Grab your Joy-Con controllers, and get your body moving to the beat! Learn popular hip-hop dance moves from basic to complex. But you won't be alone on your dancing journey. Four instructors help along the way!

name: Unpacking Universe Dreams
description: Unpack, Arrange, Create - Shape your world

name: Symmetrical Logic Puzzles 1000
description: A luxurious puzzle game where you separate scattered gems into different rooms. However, the rooms must be point-symmetric with the gems at the center.

name: Sweet Survivors
description: The purr-fect storm is coming! Can you protect your café from fluffy chaos?

name: Survive Undead Rush
description: Outrun, upgrade, and survive the relentless zombie onslaught!

name: Fernando Fernández: Un Rescate Accidentado
description: Sin descripción

name: Punky Doodle
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: An action platformer developed by Konami for the NES and Famicom in 1989.

name: Fernando: Detective Privado
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny the Mole
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn and Play: Blackjack & Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Run An Empire
description:
A fun, free motivation to move further! Capture real world places and compete against neighbors with every step you take.

Whether walking to your workplace or running a marathon, capture the places you move through to build a formidable empire. Explore further to collect resources and earn great fortunes. Lead your people from the dawn of time to the Space Age.

“Don a pair of sneakers and run (jog, or walk) to victory” Engadget

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Grim Protocols
description:
This update will include:
New Game Mode - Havoc: Think you’ve mastered the threat over Tertium? Think again. Havoc is a new end-game experience that will test the resolve of the most seasoned operative. Be ready to face daunting challenges and earn new cosmetic rewards. We’ve posted an initial dev blog about this, and we’re working on finishing the Q&A post to follow.
New Mission - Dark Communion: Return to the Carnival and explore its darkest corners. Steel yourself as you face hordes of cultists who will stop at nothing to achieve their Dark Communion. We are working on a dev blog for this.
Three New Weapon Families: Tear through waves of enemies by wielding the destructive might of the Two-Handed Force and Power Swords, and the Ogryn Heavy Stubber.

name: Final Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Gear Solid
description: Sin descripción

name: Blur Overdrive
description:
Blur Overdrive is a racing game from the overhead perspective that, despite having different camera views and controls from the original Blur (PC, XBox 360, and Playstation 3), still offers up a similar experience of driving in lightning-fast races with all kinds of dirty tricks.

You have more than twenty different vehicles to choose from, all of which you can personalize by changing colors and adding different upgrades. Of course, the majority of them need to be unlocked by winning competitions and saving up money from different races.

Your objective during each race is to come in first, but that doesn't necessarily mean that you have to be the fastest. To help things go your way, you can use up to eight different power-ups that allow you to activate shields, drop mines, launch lightning bolts, and much more.

Blur Overdrive is a fun three-dimensional racing game that, in addition to boasting excellent graphics, has truly great gameplay. Its control system, which is often a problem in other Android racing games, is a true delight.

name: Goombario's Quest
description: Goombario's Quest is a Mario fangame where you embark on a great adventure as Goombario to save the Mushroom World from Goomboss's evil plans. Join Goombario and Goombella on this epic quest to stop Goomboss from getting the Cosmic Star!

name: Flower Girl Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: A Typical Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Bob-Ball
description:
A Bob-Ball (which is type of Bob-Omb) found a paddle that can move on its own, and decided to have fun with the paddle. However, he didn't realize that somehow a timer is set on the Bob-Ball.

It's a Breakout-clone, but with a timer. Once you run out of time, the Bob-Ball explodes and the game ends. There is six powerups and high scores. High scores are the only thing that is for replay value however, so you probably won't play this a whole lot if high scores aren't your thing.

name: Mud Pies
description: Sin descripción

name: Fregocles y la Desinfección del Olimpo
description: Sin descripción

name: Frisbee Fumbling
description: Sin descripción

name: Riki 8Bit Game Collection
description: Riki 8bit Game Collection is not just one experience, but many. To be precise, it includes five unique games and music albums. Kira Kira Star Night lets you collect stars while running through a pixelated, surreal cityscape. In Astro Ninja Man DX, you defend against threats from above by shooting upwards—just like in the classic arcade games of the 70s and 80s. And the trilogy of albums—8bit Music Power, 8bit Music Power Final, and 8bit Music Power Encore—will stay with you long after you turn off the power.

name: Genbu's Favour
description: Sin descripción

name: TCG Trading Card Shop Sim
description: Manage your own TCG shop! Stock cards, figurines, customise the interior, and expand your store. Let people compete in your shop and build a personal card collection of rare finds!

name: Gallery: Coloring book & decor
description: Gallery combines a coloring book and house design game with a rich story. Become a painting master, express yourself through a range of artworks!

name: BS The Legend of Zelda: Ancient Stone Tablets
description: A four-part mod which restores the content and playability of BS Zelda no Densetsu: Inishie no Sekiban, which was never officially localized, and its original files are partially lost in time due to being released via radio broadcasting. Through MSU-1 support, it optionally adds CD-quality English dub.

name: BS Zelda Restoration Map 2
description: A which restores the content and playability of BS Zelda no Densetsu Map 2, which was never officially localized, and its original files are partially lost in time due to being released via radio broadcasting. Through MSU-1 support, it optionally adds CD-quality audio.

name: BS Zelda Restoration Map 1
description: A which restores the content and playability of BS Zelda no Densetsu, which was never officially localized, and its original files are partially lost in time due to being released via radio broadcasting. Through its MSU-1 support, it optionally adds CD-quality audio.

name: Mini Football
description: Put on your boots and get ready to go onto the pitch in this brand-new football game! Experience football like never before in this fresh and easy-to-play football game. In Mini Football, you will enjoy a casual gameplay experience, while still remaining loyal to the original game. Calling all strikers, midfielders, defenders, and goalies: get ready for kickoff! It’s time for you to get the crowds roaring in the stadiums, score some amazing screamers, and build the strongest team that ever existed! Score a goal in this fun, intuitive football game!

name: Metanoia
description: Metanoia is a visual novel that explores the fear of being trapped in a psychiatric ward and unable to leave, as well as the fear of an incredibly unethical doctor not having your best interests at heart.

name: Hanafuda Koi-koi Dojo
description: Sin descripción

name: Pippa and Your Phantasmal Problem
description:
Ms Ester's beautiful and neat house has been mysteriously wrecked in the past few weeks and nobody knows why. Patches of dirt on the carpet, things gone missing, and all sorts of mess keeps happening around the house. The police was called to investigate, a priest was invited to bless the house, and a group of ghostbusters was hired (they were so expensive!) and none of them found anything. How useless!

If this problem isn't solved by the time Ms Ester returns from her short trip, she'll kick you out. You have to find someone who can help: anyone will do, even this unreliable looking, self-proclaimed witch you just randomly met.

name: Shadowhand Solitaire
description: Ride with Lady Cornelia Darkmoor - aristocrat by day, highwaywoman by night. Play your cards right to untangle a web of corruption, smuggling and blackmail in this swashbuckling solitaire adventure. Your fortune and freedom are at stake!

name: Delicious: Emily's Big Surprise
description: Enjoy this surprisingly cute mini-game from the famous Delicious series! Hilarious chaos ensues in Snuggford as Emily plans a big surprise for Patrick. But Patrick thinks he's on to her and starts to prepare a surprise of his own. Meanwhile Francois is freaking out because he's terrible at keeping secrets. And what’s up with Snuggy the cat?

name: Pranksters: Treasure of the Indians
description:
In Pranksters a city is plagued by rowdies which play pranks on innocent people. Now the player takes the role of a male or female kid to set things right. There are basically two goals per level: Drive away all rowdies and gather enough money for the bus. This is done by playing either nice tricks, e.g. washing off graffiti, or bad tricks, e.g. using a banana peel so someone slips.
The usage of tricks influences the village's morale either positive or negative, when it gets too low the game is lost. To do tricks the player has to use and combine items he finds on the streets. These depend on the character's gender and are randomly distributed. When pranksters get a hand on the player they pummel him and he loses life energy.

name: Orion Drift
description: You and your fellow robots were once Earth's premier athletes. Now forge a destiny among the stars together!

name: Maze
description: Play classic stress-relieving mazes or discover many original ones with square, circular and triangular maze shaped games. Enjoy more than 100 combinations of maze sizes, types, shapes and games modes. Special maze forms are also available: with bunny, guitar or tree shaped mazes.

name: Eureka
description: Eureka is full of brainteasers and fun mini-games that you can enjoy forever. Each brain game will be different from the previous, so you can enjoy original, creative and unique puzzles specifically designed to push your brain limits!

name: Connection
description: Connection stands out as a great time-killer; it’s relaxing because each level is quick to solve, but also incredibly addictive thanks to carefully designed FX and SFX that provide a satisfying ASMR effect and a top-notch anti-stress experience. If you’re looking for Logic Games that also serve as Brain Training, this game is a perfect match.

name: Hex
description:
Loop hex: relaxing game, anxiety relief and calm. Enjoy this minimalist game
Welcome to the Infinity Loop sequel: Hex - This calm game provides you a simple infinity loop, yet amazing technique to relax and calm yourself from your stressful day and to decrease your anxiety levels.

name: Destination
description: Use your brainpower and focus to solve anti-stress levels while enjoying a relaxing and hypnotizing experience when you find the solution. Destination is a game where you need to drive a ball to its destination, but by following certain strict rules.

name: Gakuin Makyo: High School Crisis
description: A group of boys and girls is thrown out of their world by a sudden earthquake... finding themselves in a new realm—a demon realm filled with strange monsters. Their fight to return begins now.

name: Memoirs of Murder: Welcome to Hidden Pines
description: It's time to relocate to the town of Hidden Pines! Your excitement over escaping the big city and enjoying your new home quickly turns tragic when your neighbor is murdered! To make matters worse, your spouse is the prime suspect! It's up to you to piece together the evidence and clear their name. This small-town is hiding some big secrets. Can you crack the case in time? Find out in this gripping Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Memoirs of Murder: Resorting to Revenge
description: You and your spouse have won an all-inclusive vacation to Pinecone Hill! Your excitement on the train is short-lived when you and your new friends are stalked by a mysterious and dangerous man! Can you uncover his motives and stop his sinister plot before it's too late?! Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Memoirs of Murder: Behind the Scenes
description: What starts out as a fun vacation to a true crime film set turns disastrous when Aaron's cousin Kevin is accused of murdering the lead actress. Everybody in this small town is certain he's the killer, but Aaron and Mary suspect someone is framing Kevin to take the fall. Can they prove Kevin's innocence, or will he be punished for a crime he didn't commit? Find out in this thrilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Laser
description: Dive into an electrifying fusion of puzzle and strategy - It's your mission to power up the battery by aligning energy sources. Find tranquility in the challenge, as you twist mirrors and steer beams of electricity.

However, a group of militant programmers has transformed these machines into mecha weapons that have annihilated mankind. Just when the situation seems desperate, a group of mech ninjas brings hope to humanity...

name: Masters of Cards
description: Masters of Cards is a free collectible card game inspired by the classic Heróis e Vampiros. It offers innovative mechanics, strategic gameplay, and balanced starting decks to ensure fairness. Players can build and evolve their decks over time, customize their characters, and compete in exciting battles. With fast-paced battles, new features, and improved stability, MAOC delivers a fast, stable, and engaging card game experience.

name: Eight Pool Fever
description: Set in a dynamic city, in 8 Pool Fever, the players engage in seasonal challenges, progressing through clubs to challenge the city's boss. Giving you the very best of live billiards games and pool competitions, only the most skillful 8 b pool players will conquer all challenges.

description: Cyclo 8 is a physics bike game, similar to the Trials series.

name: Phoenix Contract
description: Phoenix Contract is an exhilarating idle RPG that immerses you in a world teeming with adventure, mystery, and relentless battles. In this dynamic universe, you'll forge your legend by customizing your character, mastering unique skills, and embarking on epic quests. Engage in fierce PvP combat to prove your supremacy, challenge towering bosses for legendary rewards, and unlock the secrets of powerful heirlooms. Join forces with allies to conquer realms and shape the fate of the world. Your destiny awaits in Phoenix Contract—a realm where heroes rise, legends are born, and the adventure never ends.

name: Histoire de Lune
description: Histoire de Lune is an indie adventure game by Suits & Sandals. Explore the kingdom of Lunaire, finding weapons, upgrades and other collectables on your way. Fight against monsters deep underground and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disaster that struck the kingdom centuries ago.

Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.
And the whole game has been split into five apps for the mobile release, with 'Methods 4: The Best Detective' being the fourth part, and containing Chapters 61-85.

name: Dustbunny: Emotions To Plants
description: Dustbunny is a warm, relaxing yet guided journey of reconnecting with your repressed emotions, where the emotions are cute creatures that like to hide. If you catch one and let it express itself, it can grow into a beautiful plant - some into extremely rare plants! Care for your plants with fun interactions like watering, catching pests and so much more - you can even sing for your plant. Relax with minigames like catching bubbles in your bubble tea. As your room becomes your safe space, you might encounter your inner child in the room's hidden depths.

description: Investigate a series of deaths on behalf of the Atsmith Life Insurance Co., uncovering the relationship between these cases and the cause of your mysterious illness. Adapt to your disease and survive Terminal's seedy underbelly as you face the consequences of your search for answers.

A Resurrection after death.
There are a Knight and a Tombstone of a Lady
in the Delusion of space.
When the Night falls with the sound of wheels,
those who are drawn to the Tombstone come close, and
the Knight spends the Night fighting against them alone.
The Night the death continues and continues…

name: Mars Lives!!

name: Wildermyth: Omenroad
description: Wildermyth's second DLC introduces a new game mode that includes roguelike ​​tactical challenges with progression across runs, as well as a rich new story campaign that takes your heroes into the mysterious Netherflare.

name: VR-Kanojo
description: – An unexplored world for just the two of you is here! - The long-awaited new work from the producer of "VR Kanojo" is even more fun and cuter than ever! --Introducing "VR-Kanojo"-- Experience the special moment everyone dreams of: your girlfriend visiting your room for the first time!

name: Dawn of Decay
description: Dawn of Decay is a 3D low poly multiplayer zombie survival game where players team up to navigate immersive maps, fend off relentless zombie waves, and rely on strategic gameplay to survive.

description: Synthetic Soul: Onyx is an immersive futuristic life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the future and restore the past.

description: DLC "The Great Conquest" is based on Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion, focusing on sect management gameplay which is quite different from while not affecting the original game. If you are interested in a strategic game mode and are willing to treat our team a cup of coffee, please give it a try.

description: Expand Lords and Villeins beyond your settlement and live out the fantasy of building a Great House: purchase land titles, deploy families, engage in trade with your neighbors, and grow your wealth and influence through diplomacy or war. A new era of prosperity is here!

name: Overwatch 2: Rose Gold Mercy Bundle

name: Manipulus
description:
Manipulus is a thrilling deck-building, choose-your-own-adventure game with rogue-like mechanics and perma-death. Trapped by mysterious forces, you are made to relive your past, guiding a band of survivors through perilous times.

As a Manipuli general, form strategic defensive lines and manoeuvre your followers to activate wild abilities to defeat the oncoming monsters and lead your band to safety. Re-play your cards, re-live your actions, and fight to keep your refugees alive in this dark and captivating adventure.

It's time to FORM THE MANIPULUS!

name: Pyun Pyun Heart Throbbing Endless Love Bakery
description: Romance or befriend four lovable characters in this point-and-click visual novel as you uncover the mysteries of the town you've moved into! Make a name for yourself as you interact with these charming new characters! Or perhaps. . . familiar faces?

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Wastelands Set
description: Prepare for the ultimate survival experience with the Wastelands Set DLC! In this set, you'll find: Wastelands Dual Anger, Wastelands Brutal Thinner, Wastelands Fatal Melter.

name: PAWG Runner: A NSFW Platformer
description: Race against the clock with epic anime babes, unlocking bold outfits and NSFW options. Take on tough levels and dive into hilarious mini-games. Think you can conquer the challenges and uncover all the secrets?

name: The Mobius: Apartment
description: In a eerie apartment, explore and discover anomalies, find the rules,seeking the correct Floor and Exit of The Mobius Apartment.

name: Memocratie
description: You are the leader of the Memocratic Party. Crowds of people have gathered under your office to protest. Give them money or drive them out, the choice is yours. Each choice will determine how long you stay in power.

name: Cyber Clutch: Hot Import Nights - Overdrive Pack
description: Embrace the future of racing with the 'Hot Import Nights: Cyber Clutch - Overdrive Edition. This exclusive package features two unique car models - the agile Wasp and the sleek Scythe. Each comes with 12 distinctive holographic customization items, available only in this edition.

name: Tomb Raider VR: Lara's Escape
description: Become Lara Croft in Tomb Raider VR: Lara's Escape, an interactive cinematic VR experience based on the upcoming Tomb Raider movie (March 2018). Pursued by Trinity soldiers, Lara Croft's only means of escape is to descend into an ancient tomb. Use Lara's flashlight to explore crumbling caverns in the dangerous, trap-filled cave. Wield Lara's bow and climbing axe to escape capture as you rappel, climb and zip-line to safety.

name: Homeless Dog Motel
description: As the Homeless Dog slumbers, a nightmare creeps up to take over her night. Explore the depths of the loop her mind has trapped her in. The images that are conjured up are potentially tied to her past, allowing the player to learn more about the protagonist as they go on.

name: Forbidden Fantasy
description: Forbidden Fantasy is a choice-driven adult visual novel where you're the chosen one. Become the hero of prophecy, romance elven women, and save the world from the Demon Queen. Your quest will be filled with adventure, drama, and lots of sex.

name: Kings of Edom
description: Kings of Edom is a fantasy adventure that places you as the lone hero exploring twelve levels of mazes in your quest to find the lost crowns. Each game is unique, as an ancient spell causes the maze to bend and swirl into a new challenge when you start a new game. Monsters and traps will hinder your journey, while treasures of steel and magic will allow you to grow in might. The goal of the game is to retrieve 11 lost crowns, which will require many journeys through the dungeon. Once you have all the crowns, find the white star and perform the ritual to honor the kings.

name: TCG Multiplayer Card Shop Simulator
description: Multiplayer TCG Card Shop Simulator game. Dive into the world of multiplayer gaming by opening your own local game store! Stock your shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them open to collect the cards yourself.

name: Tri Breaker: A Sacred Symbols Odyssey
description: If Twin Breaker was a brick breaker about space, Tri Breaker is a brick breaker on steroids, and this go-around, it's all about time. Explore 40 stages spread across periods of galactic history, and obliterate the brick-breaking formula.

name: TED Tumblewords
description: Slide rows of scrambled letters to spell words in this thought-provoking word puzzle game from TED. Play every day to level up and set new spelling high scores.

name: Sand Saga
description: The Sand Saga is a next-gen falling-sand game, built on the Sand Game JS engine. Do whatever you want in the sandbox or complete missions and challenges. The game is actively being developed with an update every two weeks on Sunday and a new blog post at the end of each month.

name: Crimes Against Slimes
description:
Crimes Against Slimes is a game where you fight against the never-ending slime hordes, gain upgrades as you level up, and do whatever you can to survive as long as you can.

It is a survival game where all you can do is run away and shoot the enemies that constantly hunt you down. At first, the slime horde might seem unbeatable but the stronger you get the more you formidable an opponent you become!

Immerse yourself in epic auto chess card battles, featuring a diverse array of heroes and creatures to collect, upgrade, and lead into battle. Build the ultimate team, summon powerful allies, and engage in strategic duels against players from all corners of the realm. With a unique blend of strategy, creativity, and dynamic gameplay, Arcane Rush delivers a novel experience for auto chess and CCG enjoyers.

name: Blue Night Laundromat
description: A short 2D exploration adventure in a retro style! Explore a laundromat in the middle of the night and try to clear it!

name: Rec
description: Set in a parallel world, REC presents a thought-provoking narrative where Ukraine is universally recognized as a force for good and is heavily supported with advanced weaponry. The story begins with a Russian soldier who uncovers a secret plan designed to ignite a nuclear war, only to be killed immediately after his discovery. Players take on the role of a soldier, viewed through a bodycam, tasked with eliminating enemies in hyper-realistic environments. As you progress, you’ll uncover clues and traces leading to the deeper truth about this alternate reality in Ukraine.

name: Deliverance
description: Deliverance is a remake for Deliverance: Stormlord II.

name: Gordon Freakman
description: Gordon Freakman is a comedy-themed mod for Half-Life 2. It features abstract level design, custom sound effects and character models and a full story campaign.

name: Operatives: Revolve

Use your Machine cards that can physically attack or block damage, to battle enemies opposing your directive and uncover the hidden truths within the machinated world.

name: There's Always a Madman: Bring the Thunder
description:
In this single-player spy thriller interactive novel, secret agents Franklin Benjamin and Virginia West take on a madman named Zeus who threatens the world with a weather machine.

You may find yourself needing to de-escalate a hostage situation, investigating a crime scene, or even defusing a ticking time bomb - good thing you always bring the thunder, agent!

name: Kaamos
description: Kaamos is a bite-sized turn-based puzzle roguelike where battles are fought by matching tiles on a grid with looping rows and columns. Build your character and deck of tiles by looting equipment from your foes. Traverse a dark medieval world where the Sun went down and never rose again.

name: Survius
description:
Survius is an open world, multiplayer, zombie survival game.
Roam the deserted island and claim whatever you desire. Land, loot, friends or bodies, it's all yours for the taking.

Find and choose a playstyle that fits your preferences. Be a humble farmer, a ruthless bounty hunter, or anything in between.

Roam the open world map, exploring towns, hovels, mountains, and lakes.

Claim whatever land and loot you find.

Whether you find a place to call home, or call the whole island your home. The choice is yours.

You are not alone on this island, and it will be up to you to decide whether you help or hinder your fellow man.

Form clans and alliances. Or go another route, and spark conflict to come out on top.

Who will you trust? Who will to trust you? Many or few, it's your decision to make.

Zombies aren't the only threat here.

While some animals may be gentle or fear you, other are a far bigger threat than the undead.

Will you bring home a meal, or be the meal yourself?

name: The Righteous Scar
description: When blades fall silent, and blood tells its tale, a scar remains—a mark not of rage, but of absolution. In The Righteous Scar, violence becomes virtue, and what’s buried beneath the skin reveals a truth only the damned can see.

name: The Mirror's Curse
description:
The Mirror's Curse is a first-person puzzle solving mysterious action game. You’re trapped in a limbo — a twisted version of your own home.

To escape, you must solve intricate puzzles and evade spirits.

The mirrors are your greatest mystery and danger: while they reveal hidden clues, staring too long raises your curse level, triggering supernatural attacks.

name: 1000 Words
description: 1000 Words tells the story of a little girl whose family is falling apart. One day she meets an artist, and asks him to teach her how to draw better. He answers that she just has to train everyday, and a few years later she'll get better. But that's too slow to her; there's no time.

name: We are Warriors!

name: Don't Wake the Beast
description: In Don't Wake the Beast, a roguelite stealth game, you’ll sneak through ever-changing dungeons to steal precious treasures guarded by deadly beasts. Use your trusty grappling hook to evade traps, outsmart enemies, and solve puzzles. But beware—each treasure you claim makes escaping more dangerous!

name: Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer
description: In this point-and-click urban thriller, down-and-out private eye Kathy Rain will embark on her most dangerous case yet — the pursuit of the notorious serial killer known as the Soothsayer. Find clues, gather evidence, connect the dots, and confront the murderer before the hunter becomes the hunted…

name: Super Mario: Turd Feast

name: Quest for the Holy Joystick
description:
Quest for the Holy Joystick is a traditional text adventure and the first satirical output from the then up-and-coming zany Delta 4 Software. It spoofs the contemporary software industry and the ZX Microfairs that took place in the UK in the 80's by sending the player on a magical mystery tour all over London

The player starts out at Downing Street number 5 and must take seemingly random journey on a red London bus to get to 'the umpteenth ZX Microfair at Alexandra Palace'. Along the way the player encounters numerous cultural figures as well as some of the gaming press. The game also makes excessive fun of the text adventure scene of the time.

The interface is text driven with few static graphics, as it is written using 'The Quill' the parser is limited to verb / noun input.

Enter the town of Spatterville, meet the locals while you restore, repair, mask and spray paint everything from a kitchen to local landmarks. Buy new equipment, unlock Free Spray and transform the town.
