name: Where is the Tutorial
description: Where is the Tutorial is a game where the biggest challenge is simply figuring out how to play. Dropped into a whimsical world with no instructions, no hints, and no mercy, you're left to navigate a series of increasingly bizarre levels using only your wits and a growing sense of frustration.

name: Moonstone Island: Pool Party DLC Pack
description: Our scientists at Moonstone Island Inc. have been hard at work creating our next FREE cosmetic DLC: Pool Party!

name: Creepy Waves FM: Bugs Fixer
description: A young and promising boy applies for a job at a AAA game development company. As he starts working night shifts on probation, he experiences a series of events that could lead to no good. As the story unfolds, you will be able to choose what you would do in his place.

name: Ghostrunner II: Heat Pack
description: Experience the searing intensity of Ghostrunner 2 with the third cosmetic DLC, the Heat Pack! Ignite your gameplay experience with three heat-themed katanas and a sizzling motorcycle design as you battle through Dharma Tower and the sun-soaked wastelands.

name: AI Solitaire: 4th of July
description: AI Solitaire - 4th of July provides 3 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful girls in a patriotic style.

name: Melancholic Dreamtower
description:
"You're the new hero."

Ichiya Shinozaki opened his eyes in a strange darkness
to the words of a stranger.

"There's a princess trapped in the highest room of this tower. I need you to get her out of this place."

It felt like the premise of some RPG.
Ichiya was full of questions, but the stranger's way seemed the only way.
If he wanted to get out of here, he would have to save the princess.

Ichiya wasn't alone in his upward journey.
On the first floor was a man rendered deaf and mute.
On the second floor, a blinded man.
On the third floor, a man who coveted color.
On the fourth floor, a young girl who was terrified of men.

He undertook his so-called quest.
For the sake of the princess, for his own sake, in defiance of destiny,
steeped in the interests of five cohabitants.

5 potential suicides. 5 candidates for death.

In the overwhelming gloom of a dark pagoda.

name: The Witch of Fern Island: Spooky Witch Pack
description: Spooky Witch Pack is a unique DLC for The Witch of Fern Island that will transport you into a world of dark mysteries and eerie adventures! Infuse your game with an atmosphere full of horror and magic. Feel a thrilling chill!

name: Myth of Empires: Hellenic Civilization Pack
description: As the first new civilization DLC for Myth of Empires, the Hellenic Civilization Pack contains 12 new armor sets, 15 special weapons, a full set of new building recipes, 1 warship, 6 musical instruments, and 5 building platforms, adding a whole new dimension to the game!

name: Barro F22: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro GT: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro T23: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Human Summer Outfit Pack
description: The sun is out, and the beaches of Crescent Cove are brimming with energy! Gear up for the Klown invasion with this assortment of summer themed human cosmetics! This DLC includes summer themed tops, bottoms, hats, and eyewear. All items are purely cosmetic and do not alter gameplay.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Tracker - Slappy
description: As a Dark Jester, more than just laughter is needed to satisfy this Klown. Nothing is more funny to Slappy than the sounds of humans fleeing in terror. Slappy is a special character skin for the Tracker Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Hunter - Zombo
description: Bearing scars and "leftovers" from a previous invasion attempt long ago, Zombo returns with a vengeance to consume any human that crosses his path! Zombo is a special character skin for the Hunter Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Tank - Gutso
description: Never satiated, Gutso has been hunting and consuming humans for many many ages. Driven by this hunger, genetic evolutions have taken this Klown to new levels of Konsumption. Gutso is a special character skin for the Tank Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Brawler - Impy
description: A devilish little imp with a knack for killing. Don't let the tail fool you, Impy is light on his feet and ready to strike fear into the hearts of those frightful human snacks. Impy is a special character skin for the Brawler Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Fatso
description: The beloved, rotund brother of Chubby, Fatso makes short work of invasions so he can get back to feasting on human delicacies. Fatso is a special character skin for the Tank Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: HenPri
description: Thrown into prison for an act of self-expression, protagonist Shuichiro must confront both a violent system and his own actions—or else try to find happiness on the inside in this censored visual novel from the makers of NUKITASHI.

name: 250 Banjin no Kanken Premium: Zenkyuu Zen-Kanji Kanzen Seiha
description: A kanji training game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Paragon Pioneers 2: Isle of Magicians
description: Build a school of wizardry on a mystic island and establish a mage population there. The portal network provides an alternative and instant way to move goods and units between islands and even more content is juicing up your base game!

name: Choujin
description: Action top-down shooter for the exclusive Japanese home computer Sharp x68000. The player must eliminate all the enemies in order to progress, they can also encounters some bosses throught the stages.

name: Space Escape
description: A rogue-like arcade shoot-'em-up.

name: Beat, Heart, Beat
description: Beat, Heart, Beat is an autoscrolling rhythm-platformer centered around slashing through enemies to the music to maintain your momentum and traverse your way towards your own heart. There are three directions to slash - up, down and right in front of you. Slash in the correct direction to aim your attacks at enemies and dash into them. Performing a series of slashes to the correct rhythmic pattern is the key to reaching the end of the stage and advancing onwards to your heart.

name: MythWalker
description: Turn any dog walk or errand run into an adventure! MythWalker is a mobile geolocation fantasy RPG that explores Earth’s parallel world, Mytherra. An ethereal mystical being guides players through an overworld traversal system, using real locations to tell the stories of Earth’s myths and legends. Now, Mytherra faces an unknown threat that endangers both worlds. A powerful mysterious being, reaches out for help, recruiting you – the Mythwalker, to uncover the truth, explore the connection between the worlds, and lead Mytherra’s heroes in their defense. Will you answer the call and save both planets?

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Godzilla
description: Smash through the competition ad Godzilla, the mighty King of Monsters!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Hatsune Miku
description: Party as the cheerful Virtual Singer Hatsune Miku, ready to share her love for music with the world!

name: A Mole in Space
description: Embark on a short space journey to fix Moley's Spaceship and help him to continue his space expeditions. Three fully fleshed tough levels that will challenge your gaming skills. Unlock new powers as you progress and find more ship parts. This very short hack doesn't save and has infinite lives. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.
description:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. takes the gameplay of Virtua Fighter 5 and raises it to new levels! Rollback Netcode support, gorgeous 4K visuals and additional content make it the best version of this legendary game ever.

The legendary fighting series makes its Steam debut with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.! Challenge the greatest fighters in the world in the ultimate remaster of the classic 3D fighter,now featuring Rollback netcode support, gorgeous 4K graphics, and all the bone-crunching, martial arts combat of the renowned original. Battle through classic VF modes like Arcade or Rank Match, create your own custom online tournaments and leagues with up to 16 players, or learn from the best in Spectator Mode. Master your fighting style to defeat all challengers in the Fifth World Fighting Tournament and become a Virtua Fighter legend!

name: Uncle Unco
description: One Fluffy Ball, One Late Bus! A Hyper-Cozy game by @Jonniemadeit

name: Reality Drift
description: Reality Drift is a roguelike racing game where your choices matter. Race through a series of strange worlds, choose upgrades for your car and decide which track will be next - your decisions are just as important as how you drive!

name: Madness Arena
description: Enter the ultimate battleground, where chaos reigns and survival is everything. Every decision could be your last—will you rise to the challenge or descend into madness? Master powerful abilities, crush your

name: Half Away
description:
Half Away is a One-Shot Narrative adventure where you play as Juna, exploring a mystical Spirit Realm.

Use her unique ability to hear hidden voices to solve puzzles and interact with enchanted objects and spirits.

Discover secrets, face challenges, and uncover multiple endings in this magical journey filled with exploration, puzzle-solving, and storytelling.

name: Globs
description: Globs is a puzzle game about the size-changing Globs. Use the properties of their bodies at your advantage to solve a variety of levels, by using them to push each other or against walls, squeeze into tight gaps, grow to block holes.

name: Slime 3k: Demake
description: A blob of goo, initially used to nourish artificial humans, has become sentient and risen up against its creator—the Despot, an evil AI and the unfortunate ruler of the world in the year 3000! The future is bleak, and humanity is beyond redemption, but at least you have the power to save yourself. This demake is a mini-version of the game Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot.

name: Poke Mission 97
description: Sin descripción

name: Relentless Expanse
description: Capture and upgrade planets, outsmart your enemies, and conquer the galaxy! Simple yet addicting, you can play alone or outsmart your friends in this 2D top-down space RTS. Completely free, no monetization, just fun!

name: Grok
description: Sin descripción

name: Saga of Guardians
description: Saga of Guardians is a unique collectible card game and auto battler. Build YOUR deck, place your cards strategically and climb the ranks in the PVP Arena.

name: The Indirect Castle Retreat
description: A third person exploration adventure game. Walk, run, and jump as you explore the castle. Pick up useful items to progress. Look at objects of interest to understand the history of the castle.

name: Rottenroots
description: Rottenroots is a branching narrative role-playing game set in a dystopian world where conformity means survival. Guide Salem through moral dilemmas, time-pressured choices, and dynamic character interactions. Your decisions shape his personality, relationships, and fate in this gripping story.

name: Cloud Piercer
description: It's time to go on an adventure! Board an airship, load your cannons, set off to discover the secrets of the clouds and... Who knows? How far can you go?

name: Lern Island Letters
description: Lern Island Letters is a short narrative game where you play as a postman, sorting the mail of the five intriguing residents of a remote island. Pick up on their peculiar habits through hints on the envelopes, discover their secrets, and try to save this peaceful haven from its fate.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - A New Venture on the Eighth Dawn
description:
Version 2.7 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Sunday and Fugue
• New Trailblaze Mission: "A New Venture on the Eighth Dawn"
• New areas: Party Car and Trailblazer's Room
• New main event: Cosmic Home Décor Guide
• …and more!

name: Gunter Abstrauer
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario FA: Vanishing Colosseum
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario vs. Windows 95
description: Mario vs. Windows 95 is a platformer which intends to be a throwback to the early days of MFGG fangaming. Inspired by Supertoad2k's Yoshi vs. Windows, the game has Mario, with the help of the spirit of Bill Gates, fighting against an evil virus which is attempting to take over his newly purchased computer.

name: Comic Book Universe
description: With a fully-customizable, easily editable game universe that has been designed to give you extreme flexibility, CBU sees the user take control of the forces of good from far and wide to stand up against the tide of evil. The game features highly-detailed tactical battles between teams of unique characters who can evolve as the game progresses, ongoing storylines that constantly shift the game world, betrayals and heated rivalries, factions that can see members come and go, all leading to an ultimate Battle For The Universe that sees the most powerful characters fight for supremacy!

name: Zippy Race
description: The SG-1000 port of Zippy Race, otherwise known as Motorace USA.

name: Pacewar
description:
Pacewar is a relatively simple fighting game between two teams of space ships. A team wins the round when all ships of the other team are destroyed, and a certain number of victories more than the other player is needed to win the game. But there's a catch: as a team gets closer to winning, it loses ships, so you need to be better than the other team to succeed.

Human players take over one ship at a time from their respective teams. If a human player's ship is destroyed, that human player takes over an AI ship from their team randomly. This ensures that the human players are always in the game.

name: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition
description: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition is a fangame created by the Core Dev Team in order to bring the Mario community together in a fun way.

name: Wario Land Remix
description: Wario Land Remix is a platformer puzzle-solving game which will adapt into a SNES Appearance with Wario as the mascot in his remake misadventures from before and with upcoming new chapters along the way.

name: Super Mario Bros. MM
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Unnamed Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Halloween Horror
description: Sin descripción

name: Flip Flop XL
description:
A minimalist one button flipping game.

Press and hold to begin crouching, and then release to jump, flip, and fall to pieces. Time your jumps to perform flips and land on your feet, get as many flips as you can in a row and beat your friends scores.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Stars Derailed
description:
Version 7.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VI: Wails Stifled by the Silent Shadow
• New Part 2 Open World: Ruimu, The City of Eternal Night
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Thousand-Faced Maestro: Cameo (Sparkle)
• New Crossover Event: Honkai: A Fool's Hand
• New Event: Snazzy Cards Club
• ...and more!

name: Haluz
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Netherforce Shards
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Fusion: Revival
description: SMF:R was a side project to Mushroom Kingdom Fusion, with a larger focus on Mario-esque gameplay.

name: Haluz 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wartales: The Skelmar Invasion
description: Plunge into Ormance, a once-defended county now overrun by the largest invasion in its history. The Skelmars, united for the first time under the cruel High Jarl Sven, chosen by the Gods, have joined forces to raid Edoran in a ruthless quest for its riches and fertile lands. This unprecedented alliance of clans has torn through the region, spreading chaos and ruin in its wake.

name: Wartales: The Pits
description: Dive into the black markets where the wealthiest brigands in the Five Kingdoms hold secret battles. Engage in intense battles in this combat-focused content, designed to test your strategic and tactical skills. Will you be brave enough to face this challenge?

name: Super Marisa World Fusion
description: Sin descripción

name: Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart - Collector's Edition
description: The Heart of Tearstone has gone missing! Ten years have passed since your last journey into this strange world, and with the Heart’s disappearance, powerful sorcery has taken hold! With few clues to follow, your quirky troop of friends has summoned you to help solve a growing mystery and save the inhabitants of Tearstone! Who took the Heart? What secrets does it contain? … And is this airship actually safe? There’s only one way to find out! Climb aboard and hold on tight for a challenging and enchanting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game for the ages!

name: Super UDK & RU Country
description: Sin descripción

name: Inheritance of Ash
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Emblem: Bloodlines
description: Sin descripción

name: Mini Game Compil' 3
description: Mini Game Compil' 3 is a compilation of 16 mini games inspired by Nintendo licenses for the most part, and some others that aren't Nintendo's.

name: Head over Heels
description: Sin descripción

name: Frogmageddon
description:
Fight hordes of the evil snake army as one, several, dozens, hundreds of frogs, each with unique abilities and quirks. Frogmageddon is a bullet hell survival game where you flip the script of survival gameplay and become the horde yourself! Can you make it to 100 frogs and defeat the evil tyranny of King Snek?

Initially made for the GMTK 2024 Game Jam, the Steam version includes controller support, achievements, new game modes, new frogs, and much more!

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Reloaded Edition
description:
Now with guns! With the Reloaded Edition, the arsenal at your disposal has grown massively. Be creative with your combat or outrun your foes as you enjoy the perks of more than 10 post-launch updates. Good luck out there, and stay human!

It’s been 20 years since the events of the original game. The virus won, and humanity is slowly dying. You play as Aiden Caldwell, a wandering Pilgrim who delivers goods, brings news, and connects the few remaining survivor settlements in barren lands devastated by the zombie virus. However, your true goal is to find your little sister Mia, who you left behind as a kid to escape Dr. Waltz's torturous experiments. Haunted by the past, you eventually make the decision to confront it when you learn that Mia may still be alive in Villedor — the last city standing on Earth.

You quickly find yourself in a settlement torn by conflict. You’ll need to engage in creative and gory combat, so hone your skills to defeat hordes of zombies and make allies. Roam the city, free run across Villedor’s buildings and rooftops in search of loot in remote areas, and be wary of the night. With every sunset, monsters take control of the streets.

name: Morgan's Skate Club
description: A skateboarding game with similar controls to classic Tony Hawk games. With four lively skateparks to choose from, take control of various skaters and perform strings of crazy tricks. Talk up all the animal ladies too. Show off your skills and unlock more animal ladies on skateboards.

name: Dungeon of Grandmasters
description: You've embarked on an adventure in a cave. Take out all the monsters that will try to defeat you and survive until the end. Dungeon of Grandmasters is a roguelite game that allows you thousands of combinations to defeat the enemies that appear, allowing you to play alone or with friends.

name: Blood Cleaner
description: In Blood Cleaner, you’re Amaan, a cleaner hired to tidy up an old mansion. But as eerie clues and bloodstains emerge, you’re left wondering—was there a crime, or is something haunting these walls? Clean up…or get caught in the mess.

name: Chakana
description:
You planned for a quiet evening. The table is set, the atmosphere is warm, and the night seems to be unfolding just as you'd hoped. But as the meal progresses, something feels off.

In this atmospheric horror game, explore your home as strange events disrupt your date, leaving you to navigate through questions, confrontations, and your own dread. Each decision can bring you closer to unraveling the mystery or plunge you deeper into its grip.

The time is running out, manage the eerie silence, and tread carefully to keep your secrets hidden—or risk exposing yourself. Face a twisting psychological horror that questions how far you'd go to protect yourself from your fate.

name: Fruit Merge
description: Fruit Merge is a puzzle game where players merge matching fruits to create bigger ones, ultimately aiming to make watermelons. You drop and position fruits strategically to set up merges, managing space to prevent the container from overflowing. The game challenges you to plan your moves carefully as larger fruits take up more room, and it rewards progression with higher-level fruits. The goal is to keep merging while avoiding game over and reaching the highest fruit size possible.

name: Follow The Banner
description:
Follow the Banner is a multiplayer strategic medieval warfare game.
Two armies composed of players (or bots) fight in turn-based battles on hexagon maps.

name: Report One
description: Report One (Upgrade Edition) is a single player modification from the Report series, for Half-Life, which has an independent universe, saturated with alternative or completely different events, though with some main references to Half-Life 1.

name: Report One: Operation Alive
description:
Report One: Operation Alive is a Half-Life modification from the Report series, a story about Kyle Rodriguez, a corporal who will go through blood and sweat, but will overcome the opponents.

Kyle will meet old friends, and the good old villain Mason. He will also fight the mercenaries, and prove that the soldiers do not eat bread for nothing, eventually saving everyone!

name: Scared Rider Xechs + Stardust Lovers
description: A PSP bundle of both Scared Rider Xechs games.

name: Report II
description: continuation of Gerald's adventures only within city 19, but 20 years after stasis. New secrets, new acquaintances, new villains are waiting for you in the second part.

name: Report III
description: Part 3 of the mod from the Report series, will tell you about the subsequent adventures of Gerald. About his confrontations with the new enemies of humanity, as well as the old villains who are still hungry for revenge after 20 years.

name: Report: Stas
description: Report: Stas is a prequel to the second part of the Report series. It will tell you a story, about a former Black Mesa security guard by the name of Stas. Events take place 2 hours before Gerald's arrival.

name: The Useless App
description: This app is useless, so don't download it.

name: Pri-Pia: Prince Pia Carrot
description: Sin descripción

name: sspp03's Super Mario Bros. Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hardware Store Simulator
description: Compete with up to 4 players to build the most successful hardware store! Design your shop, manage inventory, hire employees, and influence market prices in this detailed business simulator. Master retail management as you expand your store empire.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 6
description: It’s the Snoop D-O-Double G! With more than 35 million album sales worldwide, Snoop Dogg is one of the biggest rap and hip-hop icons in the world, and now he’s the Icon for Fortnite Festival Season 6.

name: Solitary Echoes
description: You were a technical support engineer on a geoforming outpost on LV-513, tasked with changing a very important light bulb when the outpost was overrun by a hostile alien lifeform. During the attack you managed to grab some supplies and lock yourself into a maintenance room. After some days, the noise and the screams from outside slowly die down. After some weeks, your supplies slowly run out. Time to head out. See what's going on. Find help. Survive.

name: World Drawn
description: World Drawn is a game in which you play as two characters who save a young girl.
